languages.text: {n}Тревожно мигающие люмены говорят о том, что рою удалось получить из устройства некую дополнительную информацию и он жаждет поделиться ей с вами. Как только сервочерепа ловят ваш взгляд, они начинают движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Тревожно мигающие люмены говорят о том, что рою удалось получить из устройства некую дополнительную информацию и он жаждет поделиться ей с вами. Как только сервочерепа ловят ваш взгляд, они начинают движение.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тревожно мигающие люмены говорят о том, что рою удалось получить из устройства некую дополнительную информацию и он жаждет поделиться ей с вами. Как только сервочерепа ловят ваш взгляд, они начинают движение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information out of the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they start moving.{/n}

{n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

languages.text: {n}神経質に明滅するスウォームのルーメンが、装置から追加情報を抽出することに成功したこと、そしてそれをあなたに共有したがっていることを示している。あなたがサーヴォスカルたちに目を向けた瞬間、彼らは動き始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}神経質に明滅するスウォームのルーメンが、装置から追加情報を抽出することに成功したこと、そしてそれをあなたに共有したがっていることを示している。あなたがサーヴォスカルたちに目を向けた瞬間、彼らは動き始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sürünün endişeyle titreyen ışıkları, cihazdan ek bilgi edinmeyi başardığını ve bunu seninle paylaşmaya istekli olduğunu gösteriyor. Hizmeletler, onlara baktığın anda hareket etmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sürünün endişeyle titreyen ışıkları, cihazdan ek bilgi edinmeyi başardığını ve bunu seninle paylaşmaya istekli olduğunu gösteriyor. Hizmeletler, onlara baktığın anda hareket etmeye başlıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los lumens del enjambre titilan frenéticos para indicar que ha extraído más información del dispositivo y quiere compartirla contigo. En cuanto miras a los servocráneos, empiezan a moverse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los lumens del enjambre titilan frenéticos para indicar que ha extraído más información del dispositivo y quiere compartirla contigo. En cuanto miras a los servocráneos, empiezan a moverse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}伺服头骨集群的流明灯紧张地闪烁着，表明它已经从沉思者中顺利提取到了额外信息，渴望与你分享。你的目光刚刚落在那几颗伺服头骨上时，它们便活动了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伺服头骨集群的流明灯紧张地闪烁着，表明它已经从沉思者中顺利提取到了额外信息，渴望与你分享。你的目光刚刚落在那几颗伺服头骨上时，它们便活动了起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Den aufgeregt flackernden Lumen des Schwarms zufolge hat dieser die zusätzlichen Informationen des Gerätes extrahiert und brennt darauf, sie mit dir zu teilen. Als du deinen Blick auf die Servoschädel richtest, setzen sie sich in Bewegung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Den aufgeregt flackernden Lumen des Schwarms zufolge hat dieser die zusätzlichen Informationen des Gerätes extrahiert und brennt darauf, sie mit dir zu teilen. Als du deinen Blick auf die Servoschädel richtest, setzen sie sich in Bewegung.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'essaim cligne nerveusement des lumens, indiquant qu'il est parvenu à extraire des informations supplémentaires de l'appareil et qu'il est impatient de vous les communiquer. Les servocrânes commencent à bouger dès que vous vous penchez au-dessus d'eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The swarm's anxiously flickering lumens signify that it has managed to extract additional information from the device and is eager to share it with you. As soon as you look over at the servo-skulls, they begin to move.{/n}
